long_description: The soft and supportive Merrell Violetta Sandals offer cushy comfort for your feet on summertime strolls to the beach and back. Nubuck leather uppers have breathable mesh linings that feel great next to skin. Rip-and-stick closure system allows quick adjustability and easy on and off. Molded nylon arch shanks support your feet during long days; air cushions in the heels absorb shock and add stability. EVA midsoles with Air Cushion shock-absorbent heel pockets offer all-day cushioning comfort. QForm(R) alignment system provides women with a precise anatomic fit for superb tailored comfort. You'll love the feel of the soft, cushy microfiber-wrapped footbeds; footbeds are treated with Aegis(R) Microbe Shield antimicrobial solution to help prevent odors. Sticky rubber soles provide good grip. Closeout.
short_description: The soft and supportive Merrell Violetta Sandals offer cushy comfort for your feet on summertime strolls to the beach and back.
